外企最喜欢的同事Top 15
1 He/She has a sense of responsibility and will never let his/her team down.
他／她责任感很强，绝不会让他／她的团队失望。

2 He/She works very hard and is always diligent.
他／她很努力工作，总是很认真。

3 He/She is always on the lookout for ways to improve himself/herself.
他／她总是在找方法完善自己。

4 He/She manages time effectively.
他／她能有效率地运用时间。

5 He/She cooperates well with everyone.
他／她和谁都能合作愉快。

6 He/She is supportive of others.
他／她相当支持其他人。

7 He/She is able to work well even under pressure.
他／她就算在压力下也能工作得很好。

8 He/She helps others to straighten out the messes they made.
他／她会帮其他人善后。

9 He/She gives the workplace a dynamic atmosphere.
他／她会给工作场所带来很有活力的氛围。

10 He/She thinks positively.
他／她总是很积极地看事情。

11 He/She is not only a good leader but also a good follower.
他／她不但是个好的领导者，也是个好的跟随者。

12 He/She always works hard without any supervision.
他／她不需监督就会努力工作。

13 He/She always keeps his/her appearance professional.
他／她总是保持着专业的仪表。

14 He/She is good at coming up with ideas.
他／她擅长想出好主意。

15 He/She has the company’s best interests in mind.
他／她总是会考虑到公司的利益。
